shortDescription: Buffer overflow in the register function in Ultra Star Reader ActiveX control in SSReader allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors, as exploited in the wild.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.
vulnerabilityName: ssreader ultra_star_reader Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
